name: MAKE OR BREAK
description:
Make or Break is a progressive and interactive story in which your actions and decision making throughout determine the planets destiny. You will be faced with various scenarios, but you must choose wisely, as the game, from a neutral atmosphere, can go to hell in a bucket, or conversely, create a heaven on earth.

Due to a known issue on Web GL build the custom cursors do not show up on certain browsers. For the best experience please download the PC version.
